actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the pension plan reserves of a life insurance company shall include amounts allocable to certain trusts forming part of a pension, profit-sharing, or stock bonus plan all of the participants of which are residents of Guam.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit residents of Guam to invest private retirement funds in tax-exempt pension, profit-sharing, or stock bonus plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the pension plan reserves of a life insurance company shall include amounts allocable to certain trusts forming part of a pension, profit-sharing, or stock bonus plan all of the participants of which are residents of Guam.
